name: Eternal Protector of the Skyward Marches
requirement: Successfully complete events around the Skyward Marches.

bits.text: Help the Astral Ward Calm Agitated Skyscales
Help the Astral Ward Drive Back the Forged
Convince Zaishen Deserters to Not Return to the Forged Stronghold
Kill the Champion Avatar of Regret
Transport Skyscales to the Western Astral Ward Camp
